:::config { "language": "php", "theme": "material-theme-default" }
<?php

beforeEach(function () {
    echo 'beforeEach';
});

test('foo', function () {
    echo 'test foo';
});

test('bar', function () {
    echo 'test bar';
});

// beforeEach
// test foo
// beforeEach
// test bar
:::style
<style>
pre code.torchlight .line-number {
    display: none;
}
</style>
:::expectation
